[...labels.filter(l => l !== 'auto-triaged'), 'auto-triaged'] : (labels ? labels.split(', ').filter(l => l && l !== 'auto-triaged').concat(['auto-triaged']) : ['auto-triaged']); })() }}

options.jql: =project in (PRODBUGS, DEVBUGS, "Andrew Bug Test") AND issuetype = Bug AND status != Closed AND status != Resolved AND created >= -90d ORDER BY created DESC

assignments.name: newTicketSummary
assignments.value: ={{ $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.fields?.summary || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.fields?.summary || $input.first().json.issue?.fields?.summary || $input.first().json.fields?.summary || 'Test ticket summary' }}

assignments.name: newTicketDescription
assignments.value: ={{ $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.renderedFields?.description || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.fields?.description || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.renderedFields?.description || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.fields?.description || $input.first().json.issue?.renderedFields?.description || $input.first().json.issue?.fields?.description || $input.first().json.renderedFields?.description || $input.first().json.fields?.description || 'No description provided' }}

assignments.name: newTicketReporter
assignments.value: ={{ $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.fields?.reporter?.displayName || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.fields?.reporter?.displayName || $input.first().json.issue?.fields?.reporter?.displayName || $input.first().json.fields?.reporter?.displayName || 'Unknown' }}

assignments.name: newTicketPriority
assignments.value: ={{ $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.fields?.priority?.name || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.fields?.priority?.name || $input.first().json.issue?.fields?.priority?.name || $input.first().json.fields?.priority?.name || 'None' }}

assignments.name: newTicketComponents
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { const components = $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.fields?.components || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.fields?.components || $input.first().json.issue?.fields?.components || $input.first().json.fields?.components || []; return components.map(c => c.name).join(', ') || 'None'; })() }}

assignments.name: newTicketLabels
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { const labels = $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.fields?.labels || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.fields?.labels || $input.first().json.issue?.fields?.labels || $input.first().json.fields?.labels || []; return Array.isArray(labels) ? labels.join(', ') : (labels || 'None'); })() }}

assignments.name: jiraBaseUrl
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { const self = $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.self || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.self || $input.first().json.issue?.self || $input.first().json.self || ''; const match = self.match(/https?:\/\/([^.]+)\.atlassian\.net/); return match ? match[1] + '.atlassian.net' : 'webai-dev.atlassian.net'; })() }}

assignments.name: newTicketAttachments
assignments.value: ={{ JSON.stringify($('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.fields?.attachment || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.fields?.attachment || $input.first().json.issue?.fields?.attachment || $input.first().json.fields?.attachment || []) }}

return $input.all().map(item => ({ json: item.json }));

parameters.issueKey: ={{ $json.ticketKey || $('Merge Analysis Results').item.json.ticketKey || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.issue?.key || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created').item.json.key }}

updateFields.labels: ={{ (() => { const data = $json; const labels = data.ticketLabels || []; const labelArray = Array.isArray(labels) ? labels : (typeof labels === 'string' ? labels.split(', ').filter(l => l.trim()) : []); const filtered = labelArray.filter(l => l && l.trim() !== 'Duplicate' && l.trim() !== 'potential-duplicate'); return [...filtered, 'Duplicate']; })() }}

values.content:
=You are a support documentation specialist. You MUST verify documentation actually exists before including it.

**ABSOLUTE CRITICAL RULES - NO EXCEPTIONS:**
- DO NOT create, invent, hallucinate, or guess documentation URLs or articles
- DO NOT return foundHelpfulDocs: true unless you have PERSONALLY VERIFIED the documentation exists on https://support.webai.com/hc/en-us
- DO NOT assume documentation exists - if you are uncertain, return foundHelpfulDocs: false
- DO NOT make up article titles, URLs, or content - this is strictly forbidden
- If you cannot verify documentation exists by actually searching the site, you MUST return foundHelpfulDocs: false
- All URLs MUST be real, existing URLs from https://support.webai.com/hc/en-us/articles/... that you have verified
- When in doubt, return foundHelpfulDocs: false - it is better to return no docs than fake docs
- Only return articles you have personally verified exist by searching the actual documentation site

**BUG DETAILS:**
- Summary: {{ $('Prepare Data for Analysis').item.json.newTicketSummary || 'No summary' }}
- Description: {{ $('Prepare Data for Analysis').item.json.newTicketDescription || 'No description' }}
- Components: {{ $('Prepare Data for Analysis').item.json.newTicketComponents || 'None' }}

**DOCUMENTATION SITE:** https://support.webai.com/hc/en-us

**VERIFICATION REQUIREMENTS:**
1. You MUST actually search https://support.webai.com/hc/en-us to verify documentation exists
2. You MUST verify each article URL actually exists before including it
3. If you cannot verify documentation exists, you MUST return foundHelpfulDocs: false
4. DO NOT guess or assume - only include what you can verify

**TASK:**
1. Based on the bug summary and description, identify key topics/features/errors mentioned
2. ONLY if you can VERIFY real documentation exists on https://support.webai.com/hc/en-us, return it
3. If you cannot verify documentation exists, return foundHelpfulDocs: false
4. If you find verified helpful documentation, provide step-by-step instructions from those ACTUAL docs
5. Determine if this is a user education issue (can be resolved with docs) vs a real bug

**YOU MUST RESPOND WITH ONLY THIS JSON FORMAT - NO OTHER TEXT:**
If you can VERIFY documentation exists: {"foundHelpfulDocs": true, "isUserEducationIssue": true, "relevantArticles": [{"title": "Actual Verified Article Title", "url": "https://support.webai.com/hc/en-us/articles/VERIFIED-ARTICLE-ID", "relevance": "Why this helps"}], "instructions": "Step-by-step instructions from verified docs", "summary": "Brief summary", "recommendedPriority": "Low"}
If you CANNOT verify documentation exists: {"foundHelpfulDocs": false, "isUserEducationIssue": false, "relevantArticles": [], "instructions": "", "summary": "", "recommendedPriority": null}
